report.title: Sample data for sample details
report.description: Report used to retrieve details of a sample excluding custom attributes for the sample details prebuilt form.
report.query:
select #columns# from samples smp join cache_samples_functional s on s.id=smp.id join cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=s.id join cache_occurrences_functional o on o.sample_id=s.id join surveys su on su.id=smp.survey_id and su.deleted=false join users u on u.id=s.created_by_id join people p on p.id=u.person_id
#agreements_join# #joins# where smp.id=#sample_id# and smp.deleted=false and #sharing_filter#

param.name: sample_id
param.description: ID of the sample to load

param.name: geom_precision
param.join: join map_squares msq on msq.id = o.map_sq_#geom_precision#km_id
join map_squares msq on msq.id = o.map_sq_1km_id

param.name: allow_sensitive_full_precision
param.description: Allow viewing of sensitive records at full precision

column.name: inputter
column.sql: case p.surname || case when p.first_name is null or p.first_name='' then '' else ', ' || p.first_name end when snf.recorders then null else p.surname || case when p.first_name is null or p.first_name='' then '' else ', ' || p.first_name end end

column.name: entered_sref
column.sql: case #allow_sensitive_full_precision# when '1' then smp.entered_sref else snf.public_entered_sref end

column.name: sample_comment
column.sql: case when o.sensitive=false or #allow_sensitive_full_precision#='1' then snf.comment else null end

column.name: geom
column.sql: case when #allow_sensitive_full_precision#='1' then st_astext(smp.geom) when '#geom_precision#'='' then st_astext(s.public_geom) else st_astext(msq.geom) end
